column3: Includes $131 and $45 for the years ended December 31, 2015 and 2013, respectively, for credit-related impairments; $26 for the year ended December 31, 2013 for impairments due to severity and duration of decline in fair value; and $22, $31 and $128 for the years ended December 31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, respectively, from change in intent to sell securities
Includes expense of $230 for the make-whole payment associated with the early extinguishment of debt
